name: Medieval Express
description:
Your destination is under siege... but packages... packages have to be delivered.

You are a courier who is working in medieval ages and your destination is under siege. You have to go through the underground basement by shifting your packages around the rooms.

How to play ?

You have to pass all 15 rooms to reach your destination. You will spawn at the left-side of the room. The blue thing is you and the green thing is your package that you have to deliver to the destination. You have to pass 15 rooms by shifting your package to inside the door that located at the right-side of the room. You can push your package or you can pull to yourself by pushing [E] when you are at the near of the package. When you grab the package, the color of package will turn into white and this means you can pull the package to yourself if you want. You will come across with some creatures in every room. They will try to reach and hit you. You can attack and kill them but you don't have to do that. You can just avoid all of them and shift your package to the next room.

Controls

[← → ↑ ↓] Arrow keys and [E] key to grab the package and start the game.

Last words...

First of all, thanks for the jam! The second thing.. ahh there is no sound, item drop mechanism, save mechanism and many other improvement.. :( Actually i have made many games for ludum dare but this is the first time that i have created a game in a strict limitation.. but in the end it was fun! I made this game in the last 4 days you can find the whole source code at the github repo.

Source Code (Github)
